def InitializeRow(entity, row): import clr
row.GetCellByName("CUSTOM_DESCONTOEABATIMENTO").Align = "right"
clr.AddReference("Benner.Erp.Web") from Benner.Erp.Web import AuthorizationHelper row.GetCustomCommand("CMD_OCORRENCIA").Enabled = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("MANTER_OCORRENCIAPARCELAS")
